ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤ventyr utspelar sig nattetid i den undre vÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤rlden.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

New York City. Home to 7,000,000 people, they work, play, and have fun
by day. But at night the city is run by ruthless street gangs such as;
The Furies, The Boppers, The Hi-Hats, The Lizzies, The Turnbull AC's,
The Gramercy Riffs and The Warriors. One night at an all gangs meeting,
the leader of the Riffs, Cyrus, makes a speech and creates a plan to
unite all the gangs of the city. One gang strong enough to overpower
the police. But suddenly he is shot and a gang called The Warriors are
framed by Luther, leader of the Rogues. Now they have to return to
Coney Island, escaping from 20,000 policemen and 100,000 sworn enemies.
They got one way out. They got one chance. They've got one night.
